title: The LilyFlower Art Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION 

This is some //damn fine// art.

-- Maria Jones, Director, RAISA
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

++ Foundation Safety Posters
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ Avoid confidence scams!"]]
[[image Poster1 
]]
@@ @@
But they might ask for your soul.
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ Trust your senses!"]]
[[image Poster2]]
@@ @@
This goes for other senses, too. If you start being able to feel magnets, let someone know.
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ Watch out for doppelg√§ngers!"]] 
[[image Poster3]]
@@ @@
Check first it's not a window.
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ Keep an eye on your husband!"]]
[[image Poster4]]
@@ @@
This doubles for pets.
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ Remember you're being watched!"]]
[[image Poster5]]
@@ @@
They //say// there's none in the toilets...
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ Never forget who you fight for!"]]
[[image Poster6]]
@@ @@
If you dislike children, think about working for the GOC instead.
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@
+++ More coming soon...
author: LilyFlower
